resources.string: Access to storage is needed to send photos and videos from the album and save pictures and videos in chat
Enable storage permissions in Settings-Apps-%s-Permissions to use sending photos and videos from the album and saving pictures in chat normally
%s requests access to photos and videos
Access to photos and videos is needed to send photos and videos from the album and save pictures and videos in chat
Enable photo and video permissions in Settings-Apps-%s-Permissions to use sending photos and videos from the album and saving pictures in chat normally
